Introduction
============
This addon register the abcjs javascripts into Plone resource registry.

For a complete information about this set of scripts, visit the official
web site : http://code.google.com/p/abcjs/

This add-on is to be included in the plone project : collective.abcmusic
https://github.com/erichardy/collective.abcmusic

NB: Version product (1.6.x) to match abcjs 1.6 version used here
